程序包 edu.ftp.client

类 FTPClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ftp.client.FTPClientImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FTPClient, StreamLogging
    public class FTPClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FTPClient, StreamLogging
    FTP client implementation for modern FTP servers. Implementations on both RFC 959 and RFC 3659 are required on the server side. Note that no exception will get actually thrown. Most methods will return null if any exception occurred.
    另请参阅:
    FTPClientHandler

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 edu.ftp.client.StreamLogging

        dateFormatter, logFormatter, logger

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFTPClient

        public static FTPClient getFTPClient​(java.lang.String addr,
                                     int port)
        Connect to FTP server. To validate FTPClient, you may check for null pointer on return value. To retrieve response, see ControlSocket.getStatusCode() and ControlSocket.getMessage().
        参数:
        addr - FTP server address
        port - FTP server port
        返回:
        FTPClientImpl

      • login

        public java.lang.Boolean login​(java.lang.String user,
                               java.lang.String pass)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Login for ftp client. For anonymous login, try 
        
 ftp.login("anonymous", "");
        指定者:
        login 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        user - username for ftp account
        pass - password for ftp account
        返回:
        true if access granted.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • quit

        public java.lang.Boolean quit()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Simply quit and close underlying controlSocket. After this operation, controlSocket will no longer be valid.
        指定者:
        quit 在接口中 FTPClient
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - .

      • setMode

        public void setMode​(DataSocket.MODE mode)
        Set mode for underlying DataSocket.
        指定者:
        setMode 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        mode - mode for DataSocket
        另请参阅:
        DataSocket.MODE

      • setKeepAliveInterval

        public void setKeepAliveInterval​(long mSeconds)
        Set keep alive interval for control socket. Typically, server will disconnect client if the socket remains idle for a period of time. In order to avoid that, the client will send a dummy packet to server once in a while to stay active.
        指定者:
        setKeepAliveInterval 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        mSeconds - the client will send a dummy packet when control socket remain idle for mSeconds

      • getStatusCode

        public int getStatusCode()
        指定者:
        getStatusCode 在接口中 FTPClient

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        指定者:
        getMessage 在接口中 FTPClient

      • rawList

        public java.lang.String[] rawList​(java.lang.String dir)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Raw response of LIST command. Calling this method directly is strongly discouraged, though some FTP server only support this command, rather than MLSD.
        指定者:
        rawList 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        dir - remote directory to list.
        返回:
        raw response.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - .

      • list

        public FTPPath[] list()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Current directory listing with LIST and MLSD.
        指定者:
        list 在接口中 FTPClient
        返回:
        Array of FTPPath, or null if the server side happen to not support MLSD.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - .
        另请参阅:
        FTPPath, list(String dir)

      • list

        public FTPPath[] list​(java.lang.String dir)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Directory listing with LIST and MLSD. Note that some ancient FTP server may not support MLSD, so good luck.
        指定者:
        list 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        dir - Remote directory.
        返回:
        Array of FTPPath, or null if the server side happen to not support MLSD.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - .
        另请参阅:
        FTPPath

      • changeWorkingDirectory

        public java.lang.Boolean changeWorkingDirectory​(java.lang.String dir)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Change current directory. Syntax like "..", relative path and absolute path are supported as well.
        指定者:
        changeWorkingDirectory 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        dir - Remote directory.
        返回:
        false if directory not found else true
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

        指定者:
        rename 在接口中 FTPClient
        参数:
        oldName - Current name.
        newName - New name.
        返回:
        false if directory not found, permission denied, or other shits happened else true.
